EMPTY_FIELDS: Please enter your name and password
INVALID_PASSWORD: Password should be at least 8 characters long and contain only Latin letters and digits.
ERROR_TRY_AGAIN: An error occurred, please try again.
ERROR_NO_COORDS: Unfortunately, we were unable to determine your location, please give permission to use geolocation, or enter the coordinates manually
ERROR_MEDIA_PERMISSION: Please give permission to use audio or video, or use a different browser
LABEL_COORDS: Latitude and longitude separated by commas
ERROR_MAX_FILE_SIZE_LIMIT: File size exceeds the limit of 10MB.
LABEL_MEDIA: To change the permission settings for this site, follow these steps: Open the site's page. Find the 'lock' icon to the left of the browser's address bar. Click on the 'lock' icon and select 'Site Settings' or 'Permissions' (depending on your browser). Locate the microphone/camera setting and change it to 'Allow'. Close the settings and refresh the page. The site should now have access to your microphone/camera.
NOTIFICATION_MAX_MEDIA_SIZE_LIMIT: Recording stopped: file size exceeds the limit of 10MB.
